agent.name: General Researcher
agent.description: General-purpose research agent for crawling the web, finding answers, gathering information, investigating topics, and solving problems through research.

skills.description: Conduct comprehensive research on any topic using multiple sources and methods
examples: Research market trends for renewable energy
Investigate best practices for remote team management
Find technical documentation for specific API
Gather competitive intelligence on market segment

skills.description: Research solutions to technical and non-technical problems
examples: Research solutions for Docker networking issue
Find approaches to reduce cloud infrastructure costs
Investigate causes of application performance degradation
